subject: Re: all forklift solutions
preview: Hi Chris,  Thanks for the screenshot. We have updated the shipping table.  Have a great weekend :)

full_threads.body:
Hi Chris,

Thanks for the screenshot. We have updated the shipping table.

Have a great weekend :)

Thanks Joel,

Yep prices in 5T and 7T are working.

Check transport cost but it's still the same price as before see screenshot.

Thanks

Hi Chris,

Thanks for sending the screenshots.

We have updated the transpo as well.

Can you try now?

Hi I have updated the spreadsheet.

Still comes up as zero check on phone and separate laptop from my work one.

Thanks

Hi Chris,

1.Just had a Quick Look and seen the 5T and 7T don't have price displayed like the other ones see pic. (Done*) Can you try it in browser incognito mode? if it doesn't work can you send us a screenshot.

4. Can we modify the transport cost to this please (Need confirmation with the pricing)
Forklifts LPG, electric forklift, All terrain and scissor lifts 1.5T-4.0T is $490plus gst
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

5.0T-7T forklifts are $690 plus gst (Need confirmation with the pricing)
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

I have attached a google doc link let me know if this is correct (You can edit it as well) and we will apply it to the site.
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1WrAPbbEP4FwuEJazdKuYajH03QKDqJyzfPxjc-APYCw/edit?usp=sharing

Thank you for the update Joel.

Many thanks.

Hi Chris,

We are working on this changes.

1.Just had a Quick Look and seen the 5T and 7T don't have price displayed like the other ones see pic. (In progress)

2.can we remove argyle number from the T&Cs list hence checking out where the card details are and just change to Wayne's number please. (Done)

3. Can you confirm that the site will save the credit card numbers, so we can charge the charge if the customer extends the hire period. (Yes, if they created an account, they have the ability to saved their cards)

4. Can we modify the transport cost to this please (In progress)
Forklifts LPG, electric forklift, All terrain and scissor lifts 1.5T-4.0T is $490plus gst
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

5.0T-7T forklifts are $690 plus gst (In progress)
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

Hi i sent an email yesterday haven't heard anything, can we please try address some of these issues, the 5t and 7t forklifts don't display prices.

Thank you.

Thanks Joel appreciate your work.

1.Just had a Quick Look and seen the 5T and 7T don't have price displayed like the other ones see pic

2.can we remove argyle number from the T&Cs list hence checking out where the card details are and just change to Wayne's number please.

3. Can you confirm that the site will save the credit card numbers, so we can charge the charge if the customer extends the hire period.

4. Can we modify the transport cost to this please
Forklifts LPG, electric forklift, All terrain and scissor lifts 1.5T-4.0T is $490plus gst
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

5.0T-7T forklifts are $690 plus gst
With postcodes that are in Sydney metro. All other postcodes to have contact us for pricing.

Thank you.

Hi Chris,

I hope all is well.

Just jumping on behalf of Andy.

We have updated the site.
  1. Phone numbers has been added to footer, contact us page. We have removed the phone number on the header as we have 2 phone number.
  2. We have updated the calculation for the days. It should always default to 1.
@joel / @heath - do we have this data and can update?

Thank you,

Each machine has its own day rate and weekly rate, I did send a spread sheet to heath a while back not sure if you can see it or not, when I get back to the office I can send it you if you don't find it in the mean time.

Thanks

Hi Chris,

Thank you. We can get these sorted this morning.

On your two points:

1. We will update
2. Is there a minimum charge (I.e one day) that we should use here?

Thanks,
Andy

****

Hi Andy,
1. Yes phone number to be Wayne-0417214224, Chris-0414377662

2. I been alerted to a pricing issue, if the customer selects they want a machine for pickup 14th and drop back 14th it's says the machine is $0.00 dollars.
Pricing is correct for each machine but need to per day/weekly. Maybe give me a call as i can explain it better, but need this sorted, as I don't want people to be able to book a free machine.

Thank you for your help.
Internal note - lets not launch a new website at end of the day going forward.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for your patience.

  1. We’ve reconstructed the about us team widget (screenshot below)
  2. The Cart, Checkout and Mini Cart Table pricing has been updated
  3. We’ve picked the product total not working and fixed it earlier, we think there may have been a caching issue - we're triple checked on our end and should be all set.
    Form Notifications has been updated
  4. For the phone number, just confirming you'd like the number updated to Wayne 0417214224 or Chris 0414377662
  5. On the domain address, it seems 'https://allforkliftsolutions.net.au/' is redirecting to https://allforkliftsolutions.kinsta.cloud/ which is the development site. I will email your DNS manager now.

Thanks,
Andy

action.text: Andy Crebar assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hey, Website has gone live issues i have found when looking at it on my phone,

The price does not appear when booking.

When you go to check out the is all jumbo'd up.

You have argyle hires phone number on our site, we are not the same business. Its comes up in the T&C

The email address on the bottom of the main page is admin@allforkliftsolutions.com our address is admin@allforkliftsolutions.net.au



The about us photos cover the writing.



Can we have these issues fixed asap please.
